title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Clinical and Dental Photography Education—Cognitive Structure and Practice Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomy Knowledge and Digital Camera Operation Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply five fundamental techniques for capturing dental photographs under clinical lighting conditions
Learners can produce images that accurately convey patients' clinical conditions by understanding principles of photographic composition
Learners can perform post-processing at a level suitable for medical records using digital image correction tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
